info.name: VSTS - Dark
info.description: A dark theme for Visual Studio Team Services (visualstudio.com). Up to date with the latest VSTS changes from April 2018 The source SCSS for this theme is available (with my other stylish themes) here.
info.additionalInfo: This theme will be undergoing constant development as VSTS continues to update, as it has been doing frequently lately.  I began writing this because I became frustrated with the other VSTS dark themes available on Stylish being out of date.  That forced me to annoyingly toggle the style on and off for different features.  No more.

data.title: Shadow instead of glow for ticket pop-up
A few issues with areas remaining white, read the rest on the forum...
Zach, could we get an update on this Stylish Theme?
Zach, could we get an update to the style for July 2018?
